Reference

All functions

abmi.camera.extras

abmi.camera.extras: Functions and data to make use of ABMI camera deployment data

ace_get_cam()

Subset camera deployments by a specified spatial area of interest

ace_join_dens()

Join estimated ABMI single-deployment density values

ace_summarise_dens()

Summarise animal density within an area of interest

density_adj

Mammal density estimations at ABMI deployments, adjusted for lure status.

public_locations

ABMI camera deployments public locations

species

Mammal species included in this package.
